messages.subject: quilting kit/beginning sewing
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, I have just joined this list as of today and have yet to introduce myself but I had to let those looking for the quilting kit know that there is one
messages.messageBody:
Hi,
I have just joined this list as of today and have yet to introduce
myself but I had to let those looking for the quilting kit know that
there is one offered by Magic Cabin Dolls. Their # is 1-888-623-6557,
call for a catalog.
Their catalog is simply beautiful and they offer much more than just
dolls. I have ordered from them a number of times and have always been
happy with the service they offer.
Hope this helps!
My name is Angela and my husband Kevin has also just joined the
list. We are the homeschooling parents of two boys ages 4 (as of
today!) and 5.
BTW, we are also pagan.
Angela

<<
>I saw a first quilting kit for children that included enough materials

>to make a couple of items, one being the perfect size for a doll
quilt.
>I was actually going to get it for myself!
>Kathy

OK, where did you see it? I would like to get it too! I want to learn
to
quilt and that sounds like an unintimidating way to start. >>

I thought it was through Hearthsong, but I just checked the catalog
(they
do have some other nice kits, knitting, looms, basket making etc). So
now
I am thinking it might have been in this catalog I can't find, something
about
log cabin dolls? I will look around some more later and post if I find
it.
Kathy
